policy.intro: Sprekar ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile app and web services.

sections.title: Information We Collect
items: Personal Information: Name, email, language preferences, and optionally a profile picture.
Audio Data: Real-time speech input for transcription and translation purposes (not stored permanently).
Usage Data: Device information, app usage statistics, crash logs and interaction history.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
items: To provide real-time translation and transcription service.
To personalize user experience and language settings.
To improve our app functionality and troubleshoot issues.
To analyze aggregate usage for performance monitoring.

sections.title: Data Sharing & Third Parties
items: We use trusted third-party services such as Google Speech-to-Text and DeepL for translation and speech processing.
We do not sell your personal information.

sections.title: Data Retention
items: Transcriptions and translations are processed in real time and discarded unless saved by the user.
User account data is retained as long as the account is active.

sections.title: Security
sections.text: We use industry standard encryption and secure cloud infrastructure to protect your data.

sections.title: Your Rights
items: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your data.
You may deactivate your account at anytime.

sections.title: Changes To This Policy
sections.text: We may update the Privacy Policy and will notify users of material changes via the app or email.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.text: For questions about this policy, email: hello@sprekar.com.
